summary:
5. Urges parties to accommodate Committee for Missing Persons exhumation requirements.

6. Reaffirms relevant resolutions, particularly resolution 1251 (1999).

7. Extends UNFICYP's mandate until 31 January 2013.

8. Calls on both sides to engage with UNFICYP on buffer zone demarcation and 1989 aide-memoire.

9. Calls on Turkish Cypriot side and Turkish forces to restore military status quo in Strovilia.

10. Calls on both sides to allow access to deminers and facilitate mine removal.

11. Requests Secretary-General to report on implementation by 10 January 2013.

12. Welcomes efforts to implement zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.

13. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
